data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Ghazni, Afghanistan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ghazni, Afghanistan

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 217 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Ghazni.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ghazni, Afghanistan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 217 believers in Ghazni to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Garwi, Kohistani people might believe through him.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 217 believers living in the state of Ghazni. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Ghazni.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ghazni, Afghanistan has a population of 1,362,600.

We estimate Ghazni has 217 people who might know Jesus, 43 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,362,341 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,279 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Ghazni, Afghanistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
